class.name: ModLoaderDeprecated
class.brief_description: API methods for deprecating funcs. Can be used by mods with public APIs.

method.name: deprecated_changed
method.description: Marks a method that has changed its name or class.[br][br][b]Parameters:[/b][br]- [code]old_method[/code] ([String]): The name of the deprecated method.[br]- [code]new_method[/code] ([String]): The name of the new method to use.[br]- [code]since_version[/code] ([String]): The version number from which the method has been deprecated.[br]- [code]show_removal_note[/code] ([bool]): (optional) If true, includes a note about future removal of the old method. Default is true.[br][br][b]Returns:[/b][br]- [code]void[/code]

method.name: deprecated_removed
method.description: Marks a method that has been entirely removed, with no replacement.[br]===[br][b]Note:[/b][br]This should rarely be needed but is included for completeness.[br]===[br][br][b]Parameters:[/b][br]- [code]old_method[/code] ([String]): The name of the removed method.[br]- [code]since_version[/code] ([String]): The version number from which the method has been deprecated.[br]- [code]show_removal_note[/code] ([bool]): (optional) If true, includes a note about future removal of the old method. Default is true.[br][br][b]Returns:[/b][br]- [code]void[/code]

method.name: deprecated_message
method.description: Marks a method with a freeform deprecation message.[br][br][b]Parameters:[/b][br]- [code]msg[/code] ([String]): The deprecation message.[br]- [code]since_version[/code] ([String]): (optional) The version number from which the deprecation applies.[br][br][b]Returns:[/b][br]- [code]void[/code]

method.name: _deprecated_log
method.description: Internal function for logging deprecation messages with support to trigger warnings instead of fatal errors.[br][br][b]Parameters:[/b][br]- [code]msg[/code] ([String]): The deprecation message.[br][br][b]Returns:[/b][br]- [code]void[/code]
